notesStmt.note: Each strophe begins a new line after indentation. One word is vocalized. The folio starts with at least six strophes from a poetic eulogy, הוי שוגים התמהמהו, by Joseph ben Sheshet ibn Latimi. A complete version was published by Dov Yarden: Sefer zikaron leha-Rav Yitsḥaḳ Nisim, zekher tsadiḳ li-verakhah, ha-Rishon le-Tsiyon, ha-Rav ha-rashi le-Yiśraʾel / ba-ʻarikhat Meʾir Benayahu, Jerusalem, 1985, vol. 5, pp. 231-232 (no. 42); Followed by, under the heading צדוק הדין, the first three verses of הצור תמים בכל פעול (Davidson, Thesaurus of Medieval Hebrew poetry 944ה).
